description: Shared type definitions for Darwin Core aligned biodiversity records

geolocation.description: A geographic point with uncertainty, following Darwin Core Location class

decimalLatitude.description: Geographic latitude in decimal degrees (WGS84). Positive values north of the Equator, negative south. Range: -90 to 90.

decimalLongitude.description: Geographic longitude in decimal degrees (WGS84). Positive values east of the Greenwich Meridian, negative west. Range: -180 to 180.

coordinateUncertaintyInMeters.description: Horizontal distance from the coordinates describing the smallest circle containing the whole location. Zero is not valid.

geodeticDatum.description: The ellipsoid, geodetic datum, or spatial reference system. Recommended: 'EPSG:4326' (WGS84)

taxonIdentification.description: A taxonomic identification with provenance metadata

scientificName.description: The full scientific name including authorship and date

gbifTaxonKey.description: GBIF backbone taxonomy key for the identified taxon

identifiedBy.description: Person(s) who made the identification (pipe-delimited for multiple)

identifiedByID.description: ORCID or other persistent identifier for the person(s) who identified (pipe-delimited)

identificationQualifier.description: Uncertainty qualifier applied to the taxon name (e.g., 'cf. agrestis', 'aff. agrestis')

identificationRemarks.description: Notes or comments about the identification

basisOfRecordEnum.description: The specific nature of the data record. Controlled vocabulary per Darwin Core.

occurrenceStatusEnum.description: Statement about the presence or absence of a taxon at a location.

dublinCoreTypeEnum.description: Dublin Core type vocabulary for the nature of the resource.

nomenclaturalCodeEnum.description: The nomenclatural code under which the scientific name is constructed.

sexEnum.description: The sex of the biological individual(s) represented in the occurrence.

taxonRankEnum.description: The taxonomic rank of the most specific name in the scientificName.
